CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Operation Crew - SG') , 'Operation Crew - SG', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Warehouse') , 'Warehouse', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Registrar Crew') , 'Registrar Crew', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Customer service (Gallery)') , 'Customer service (Gallery)', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Customer service (Museum)') , 'Customer service (Museum)', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Customer service (Special Project)') , 'Customer service (Special Project)', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Shipping Department') , 'Shipping Department', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Accounts') , 'Accounts', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'Admin') , 'Admin', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Department__c , 'HR') , 'HR','--None--' ))))))))))
CustomField.label: Department
